ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: HIST 715 is an excellent seminar for someone considering an orals field in 19th-century America or planning to do a research paper in the field. Aside from those two obvious reasons, it will also be beneficial to those who focus on the 18th and 20th centuries in drawing a more complete historiographical picture with which they can connect their own periods.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course gave me enough background that I now feel prepared to begin considering an orals field in the 19th century. It also allowed me to see how some of the issues I deal with in my own research developed in the 19th century and so will certainly be useful in that sense to my research going forward.
